name: XO Vision IR620 IR wireless headphones for in-car Video listening

reviews.name: XO Vision IR620 IR wireless headphones for in-car Video listening
reviews.reviewText: Works Awesome! My kids love them. I bought (4) headset for my 2006 Volvo XC90, the dealership wanted $130/headset. So i bought all 4 for under the price of one from Volvo dealer. Great deal, highly recommend!!!
reviews.title: Very great Buy!!!

reviews.name: XO Vision IR620 IR wireless headphones for in-car Video listening
reviews.reviewText: Works with your dvd entertainment system right out of the box. Comfortable for kids to wear. Only issue so far about quality is the plastic inner headstrap broke on one headset but doesn't seem to be missed.
reviews.title: Great deal

reviews.name: XO Vision IR620 IR wireless headphones for in-car Video listening
reviews.reviewText: These are not "plush" headphones but they work great! I have three kids so I can also say that they are "kid proof".
reviews.title: Good headphones great price

reviews.name: XO Vision IR620 IR wireless headphones for in-car Video listening
reviews.reviewText:
bought 2 of these for my boys to use in vehicle. both work great. only issue is one of the head padding straps broke the first day. but i havent been allowed to take it back and try to exchange it as it doesnt bother the kids heads or the functionality of the headphones.
would have given perfect ratings but the strap did break.
reviews.title: good stuff

reviews.name: XO Vision IR620 IR wireless headphones for in-car Video listening
reviews.reviewText: After Chrysler told me I could only use the ones from the dealership ($80.00 per pair) because of the syncing, I went online to see if there was another option and came across these. After reading all thereviews of different people saying they worked in different vehicles I thought why not, I'd only be out 10 bucks if they didn't. Soon as they got here I put in the batteries that came with them, went into the van, turned them on and instantly heard the movie that was playing. Just in time for our trip this weekend wth and extra kid in the car. Now all 3 kids will have a headset!!
reviews.title: Works great in 2012 Town and Country
